com.loveboyuan.smarttrader

Class InventoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.loveboyuan.smarttrader.InventoryController

  • public class InventoryController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by boyuangu on 2015-11-02. InventoryController maintains a unique copy of Inventory for the logged in user and saves it to the elastic search server upon request.
